ygData.msgSnippet: Ya definitely wanna check out the book Basic Blacksmithing.... it is very good at explaining the beginning things in my opinion. ... I accidently purchased
ygData.messageBody:
Ya definitely wanna check out the book Basic Blacksmithing.... it is very
good at explaining the beginning things in my opinion.


> I am a level 17 dwarf warrior that has decided to pick up blacksmithing.
I accidently purchased about 5 of those 2pp ores from steamfront (don't
ask), I have some sharpening stones (10) and a bunch of the other kinds of
ore. I have no idea how to start hehe. Does anyone know of a website or
any info on how to do and build this skill. thanks in advance
>
> Kuull
